page.title: 14PLACES OF WORSHIP
page.content: Tackley has a Norman{church,}St. Nicholas,which stands at the top of the hill overlooking the village. The{ {Rector}has the care of Tackley and three other parishes. The{church} plays an important part in the community, holds a pig roast and sale in the Autumn. The community recently raised Â£5000 in a few months to repair the fabric of the church. There is a {Methodist Chapel}situated in the heart of the village. It is cared for by a team of lay preachers. Both the church and chapel hold Sunday Schools and jointly run a youth group called {Pathfinders. {The church and chapel }work in close co-operation and combined services are held.
